column5: This lovely apartment attached to the house, but have separate entrance. Kitchen fully equipped, and has conventional oven instead of regular stove. Located in Pro-Business city FRISCO - one of the BEST and fastest growing areas in TX (210% since year 2000). With this house you don't even need VACATION home or COTTAGE bcs area surrounded by GOLF courses, MARINAS and PARKS. Perfect if you have a BOAT, or thinking to get one! It can be our own weekend getaway destination!
column8: Brand new apartment, near the lake, parks, marinas
